title: Translate Subtitles
description: Translate your edited subtitles to another language while preserving timing information.
languagePlaceholder: Enter target language (e.g., Spanish, Romanized Korean, Japanese)
error: Error translating subtitles. Please try again.
splitDurationTooltip: Split subtitles into chunks to avoid token limits
splitDurationHelp: Splitting subtitles into smaller chunks helps prevent translations from being cut off due to token limits. Use smaller chunks for longer videos.
includeRulesLabel: Append transcription rules to translation requests
includeRulesDescription: Includes video analysis context and rules with each translation request for better consistency across segments.
noRulesAvailable: No transcription rules available. This option requires analyzing the video with Gemini first.
customSubtitlesNoRules: This option is disabled because you provided custom subtitles. Custom subtitles mode skips video analysis and rule generation.
multiLanguageDescription: Translate to multiple languages at once
delimiterDescription: Choose how to separate multiple languages in the output
useParenthesesDescription: Add second language in parentheses (only for one additional language)
